description: Transformation of Millhaven Institution's Power System
full_summary:
## Tender Notice
### UNSPSC Codes: 26111700, 39111700
### Procurement Category: *CNST*

#### Tender Title: Replacement of Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) and Always On Batteries at Millhaven Institution

#### Solicitation Number: 21421-23-4419876

#### Contracting Entity: Contracting and Material Services - Ontario

#### End User: Correctional Service of Canada, Millhaven Institution

#### Tender Description:
The Correctional Service of Canada, Millhaven Institution, is soliciting bids for the replacement of the Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) and Always On batteries. The current system batteries have exceeded their life cycle, and it is essential to maintain door and barrier control as well as emergency lighting during a power failure.

#### Objectives and Deliverables:
* Replace 75 SLA12-75 or equivalent batteries
* Replace 140 S12V285 or equivalent batteries
* Ensure all systems are working and up to CSA/TSSA standards
* Remove and dispose of batteries in an environmentally friendly manner

#### Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements: *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), *North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*

#### Regions of Opportunity: Kingston

#### Regions of Delivery: Kingston

#### Tender Closing Date: July 12, 2023 at 10:00 AM

#### Expected Contract Start Date: July 17, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date: September 28, 2023

#### Contact Information:
* Name: Robin Riha
* E-Mail: [robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 328-9727

#### Attachments: [Consult the Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6318/contractor-questions.pdf)

The rewritten entry has been adapted to fit within the provided 400-word limit while maintaining readability and clarity while communicating the necessary information in a professional and concise manner.

As an added note, the rewritten entry utilizes proper markdown formatting to make the entry easy to read. Please let me know if you need any additional modifications!
